mapper.insert: insert into board ( member_id, title, region, contents, difficulty, difficulty_star, horror, horror_star, interior, interior_star, activity, activity_star, story, story_star, view, likes ) values ( #{memberId}, #{title}, #{region}, #{contents}, #{difficulty}, #{difficultyStar}, #{horror}, #{horrorStar}, #{interior}, #{interiorStar}, #{activity}, #{activityStar}, #{story}, #{storyStar}, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, title, region, difficulty_star, horror_star, interior_star, activity_star, story_star, likes, view FROM board

select id, member_id, title, contents, region, difficulty, difficulty_star, horror, horror_star, interior, interior_star, activity, activity_star, story, story_star, likes, view from board where id = #{id};
